metadata.title: Chapter 3 - Let it Roll! Let it Roll!

host.name: Mr. Fluffbutt
traits: Sits on a special throne-like perch
Has a hidden soft spot (though he'd never admit it)
host.description: Mr. Fluffbutt is a regal Persian cat who considers himself royalty. Despite his sassy attitude, he secretly enjoys helping children learn math - though he'd never admit it!

intro.title: Chapter 3 - Let it Roll! Let it Roll!
intro.subtitle: Mr. Fluffbutt's Money Math Adventure
intro.opening_greeting: Meow there! Ready to solve some fun money puzzles?
intro.description: Mr. Fluffbutt, the grumpy but genius cat, is back to quiz you on Chapter 3!
intro.progress_message: Get all the answers right, and I'll give you my special Purrfect Score Certificate!

name_selection.title: What's Your Name?
name_selection.greeting: What's your name, tiny human? And no silly cat names, please - I'm a very serious quiz master!

age_selection.title: How Old Are You?
age_selection.greeting: Before we start counting money, tell me what to call you, {name}!

age_responses.6-7: Purr-fect! You're just the right age to learn about counting money!
age_responses.8-9: Excellent! You're ready for some bigger number challenges!
age_responses.baby: Still drinking warm milk? Come back when you can count to ten!
age_responses.ship: Wow! You're older than all my nine lives put together!

sassy_responses: Oh my whiskers! Are you trying to be funny? Even my afternoon naps are more serious than this!
*sigh* I see we have a jester in my mathematical court. Let's try this ONE more time!
age_selection.final_warning: Enough games! Choose your true age now, or it's back to mathematical kindergarten with you!

questions.question: How much money does Hudson have at the start? Count with me: 2 twenty dollar bills, 1 ten dollar bill, 1 five dollar bill, and 7 one dollar bills!

host_reactions.correct: Purr-fect counting! You're as good with numbers as I am with naps!
host_reactions.incorrect: Oopsie! That's as wrong as a dog trying to purr!

questions.question: Hudson spent $12 on making flyers today. If he started with $62, how much money does he have left?

host_reactions.correct: That's right! You're as sharp as my whiskers!
host_reactions.incorrect: Not quite! Did a mouse distract you? Try again!

questions.question: Last week, Hudson spent $3 on flyers and got one job. How many jobs might he get with $12 in flyers?

host_reactions.correct: Meow-velous math skills! Keep it up!
host_reactions.incorrect: That answer is as mixed up as a ball of yarn! Let's try once more!

questions.question: Hudson got $10 for watching me, Mr. Fluffbutt, today. If he spent $12 on flyers, did he make money or lose money? How much?

host_reactions.correct: You got it! That's worth three belly rubs... not mine, of course!
host_reactions.incorrect: Hmm... that's not right. Even my afternoon nap brain knows better!

questions.question: Today Hudson got 4 new jobs! Each family will pay him $5 per day. How much could he make in one day?

host_reactions.correct: Correct! You're as clever as a cat who knows where the treats are hidden!
host_reactions.incorrect: Wrong answer! But don't worry - cats always land on their feet, and so will you!

questions.question: Calculate Hudson's starting money precisely: 2 twenty dollar bills, 1 ten dollar bill, 1 five dollar bill, and 7 one dollar bills. What's the total?

host_reactions.correct: Purr-fect counting! You're as good with numbers as I am with naps!
host_reactions.incorrect: Oopsie! That's as wrong as a dog trying to purr!

questions.question: Hudson invested $12 in new marketing flyers today. What percentage of his starting money ($62) did he spend? Round to the nearest whole percent!

host_reactions.correct: That's right! You're as sharp as my whiskers!
host_reactions.incorrect: Not quite! Did a mouse distract you? Try again!

questions.question: Using ratios: If $3 in marketing brought 1 client last week, calculate the potential number of new clients from $12 in marketing!

host_reactions.correct: Meow-velous math skills! Keep it up!
host_reactions.incorrect: That answer is as mixed up as a ball of yarn! Let's try once more!

questions.question: Hudson earned $10 watching Mr. Fluffbutt today but spent $12 on flyers. Express his net loss as a percentage of his marketing cost!

host_reactions.correct: You got it! That's worth three belly rubs... not mine, of course!
host_reactions.incorrect: Hmm... that's not right. Even my afternoon nap brain knows better!

questions.question: Today Hudson got calls from 4 new clients, each offering $5 per day. What's his potential daily revenue from these new clients?

host_reactions.correct: Correct! You're as clever as a cat who knows where the treats are hidden!
host_reactions.incorrect: Wrong answer! But don't worry - cats always land on their feet, and so will you!

messages.perfect: PURR-FECT SCORE! You're almost as smart as me... almost!
messages.great: Look at you go! Just a whisker away from perfect!
messages.good: Not bad! But I know you can do even better!
messages.needsPractice: Oops! Let's sharpen those counting skills and try again!
